sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAGECS a market town of Hungary, in the province of Hither Danube, and circle of Trentsin. It contains two churches, a synagogue, 490 houses, and 4560 inhabitants, who carry on the trades of sadlers and paper-makers. Near to it are warm baths, much frequented bv invalids. Lat. 49. 5. 35. Long. 18. 32. 25. E.
